Research Title
----------
Human activity recognition using smartphone's motion sensors.

----------




Data collection \& source(s) 
----------
Our dataset is not complete yet , but it is quite important and is structured like this :

TIMESTAMP,     Time stamp for each signal 

T_ACC_X,   Accelation on X axis 

T_ACC_Y,  Accelation on Y axis  

T_ACC_Z,  Accelation on Z axis  

EXPERIMENT ID,  ID given to each experiment 

EXPERIMENT LABEL,   Activity related to experiment


The dataset contains time series generated by all the experiments from all kind of activities e.g. SITTING,RUNNING, WALKING,...
The currnt dataset only contains raw data gathered from the experiments. As such it does not hold the information 
required for our analisys. There we will have to extrat for each experiment features like mean, variance, max , min, and other useful features to build a reliable model . The final dataset will contain such features  and the analysis will be performed on that final dataset. 

----------




Problems so far...
----------
  The main issue encountered during data collection is the fact we are missing the giroscope sensor within the SCIENCE JOURNAL App. Without the data related to gyroscope , some different activities become very similar .
